name: Catch Me If You Can (JamLabs)
description: Play this simple yet addicting game where the goal is to not get caught by the flying blobs. you get points by making the enemies collide with each other but will die if they hit you. This is my first published arcade like game any to all feed back is greatly appreciated to make my other games more fun to play. if you took the time to play and comment on my game i would like to just thank you for doing so and it will help me greatly. the idea for the game was based off of a project done by a You Tuber named Blackthornprod the game was made using game maker studio x. I hope you have fun with it :).
